intro: Follow the memories, follow the path, and discover what you will find in this puzzle adventure game.
description:
A girl who has lost her memories but can see the memories of things meets a talking traffic light. They start their journey together through a strange city to find her lost memories.

PLAYABILITY:
- Compare memories of the past with the present.
- Solve mysteries.
- Chase the girl and the traffic light in this atmospheric puzzle adventure game.
- Follow the memories, follow the path, and what you will fins is…
